title: Mother of shooting victim says 18-year-old daughter was pregnant
content:
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. -- The mother of the 18-year-old killed in Sunday's shooting in the Moncrief area says her daughter, Xacia Burnem, was pregnant.
Burnem's mother told First Coast News that she didn't know her daughter and the person of interest in the shooting were dating.
Police arrested David Anderson Wednesday following a short stand off with police. According to Burnem's mother, Anderson had asked police to bring Pamela Williams (Xacia's mother) to the scene.
Williams told First Coast News Anderson wanted to talk to her before he turned himself in.
Sunday's shooting claimed the life of Kadejah Williams, 22, Xacia Burrnem, 18, and an 11-month-old.
Anderson was arrested for possession of a firearm by a convicted felon. Police are still asking for witnesses of the fatal shooting to come forward.
According to police Anderson and Burnem were dating.
